The Army Group Duke Albrecht or Army Group D () was an Army Group of the German Army, which operated on the Western Front under command of Albrecht, Duke of Württemberg, between 7 March 1917 and 11 November 1918 during World War I.
Composition
* German Armee-Abteilung A (Bruno von Mudra then Johannes von Eben)
* German Armee-Abteilung B (Erich von Gündell)
* German Armee-Abteilung C (Max von Boehn then Georg Fuchs) : until 4 February 1918
* German 19th Army (Felix Graf von Bothmer then Karl von Fasbender) : from 4 February 1918
Sources
*[http://www.kaiserscross.com/76001/115001.html The Soldier's Burden]
*[https://artsandculture.google.com/story/6QWRgCMT7xYA8A?hl=de Die Deutschen Heeresgruppen im Ersten Weltkrieg]
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20160304132315/http://www.bundesarchiv.de/oeffentlichkeitsarbeit/bilder_dokumente/01077/index-23.html.de : Die deutschen Heeresgruppen Teil 1, Erster Weltkrieg]
